attributes.action: Recognise Pagan Handfast ceremonies as a legal marriage between two people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the government recognise Paganism as a bona fide religion they refuse to recognise pagan handfasting/marriage as a legally binding partnership, so with this petition we hope to change this. BB

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Recognise Pagan Handfast ceremonies as a legal marriage between two people."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12797.asp

Prime Minister's Office
